channel.title: Attack Styles or Emotes
channel.description:
Hello
Im new on this...
I would like to know many things :confused: :confused:
- How can I add/summon/make/or whatever, monsters, there are only like 3 guards in varrock east gate, the WHOLE world is empty, when i use ::setnpc to at least have fun attacking dragons, they are too weak, like they gain the guards stats or something like that.
-When I equip a bow/xbow, I wear my arrows too, but the character keeps attacking with the hand, also when i use weapon he/she attacks with the hand.
-Some items like, cape, ammy, when I wear it, i get disconnected from the game, and i have to edit the character file to remove the item that i wore, then log in back
-I was looking at the forums, and i saw that we have to build all the server? i saw like. "anyone: hey come to my server, bla bla bla, its 80% complete but ill have it soon bla bla bla", how can i build it?
im new in codes/java btw
i would like to play/test first this world, probbly make a great server like yours
Sincerly Thanks. Problems

@adam2348 wrote:

oh hybridscape it’s called clienthandler, on others it’s called just client

for more help from this board, maybe u should try a different server source, that has more to start with. like testscape or something.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

there is the link to server downloads on this forum. search for testscape. I think you would find it better, and come with .java.

[/quote]

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 10, 2006, 09:56:53 PM[/size][hr]how do i open the .class files?[/quote]

item.title: Attack Styles or Emotes
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

first of there are a lot of tutorials and other posts asking the same question, please try to read what’s already here, and try to learn on ur own before u come asking how to do everything. basically the server source code that you started with, doesn’t have much to begin with. which some ppl like, cuz it’s usually not as many code bugs. Making a server work is a lot of work, and a lot of reading, and learning to code, and everything. it isn’t something u just download a source, and ask how to get from that, to an uber server. I’m not putting you down, just saying, u should try reading and searching for ur questions, then if u can’t find answer, then ask 1 question at a time. you are more likely to get an answer than way.

to answer what i can about all the questions u had:

sounds like your ::setnpc or your npc.cfg is the culprit. when u add a new npc, it’s only temporary (until server restart), unless you have ur ::setnpc append your autospawn.cfg (the file that tells the server, put this npc here, and where to walk) when u use ::setnpc it adds a newnpc with probably 0 hp, but u can change that to look at npc.cfg for hp. that’s just some basic info to get u thinking, not a total how-to. lots of info on this forum about this.

about the magic and range attack, your server apparently doesn’t have any of the extensive coding required for it, so it default to melee combat. the animation default is the hand attack, which a lot of swords use (not sure).

the client you are using doesn’t like the item u have, or it could be that the server isn’t setup for that item to be equiped. i would try a different client first, then if not check to see if your server is set up for it. and ask about the equipment on here. there are a lot of items and npcs that the current clients crash on. they are still in development, just like the servers.

to build the server, u have to open the .java files and add/change/remove code to make it do what u want it to. build = programing. if ur server source didnt’ come with .java and only came with .class, (i think mopar 3.2), then either get another source or use cavaj.exe (google it, they have demo version free). that will let u edit class files, just like they are .java.

welcome to the world of coding a server, u’ll learn fast if u read and practice on ur own server. hope u do make a great server, and share it with us.

ok to answer some more of ur questions:

transparent problem is either it is being equiped in wrong spot, or client doesn’t like item, or server bug.

the funky shapes and stuff on the monsters are because they are trying to do the default animation (which isn’t for them) and you have to find out which animation is for them, and add that to the server just for that type of npc. u need standing/walking/attack/block/etc animations for npcs that are different.

Read full topic
